title: Interpretation of a table in a dream, a vision of sitting at the dining table

preview.html: The meaning of the table in a dream for a single, married, pregnant, and divorced girl. A lot of food and determination. The table and chairs are broken, and in the dining room she sits and eats with relatives, with someone she loves, alive or dead, from Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dining room in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a dining room in a dream is a good and praiseworthy omen because it symbolizes blessings. And enjoyment of the world of goodness. It can also symbolize victory over the enemy and means the appearance of the dining room with various and different dishes and types of food or drink that indicate the great wealth and happiness of the life of the wealthy. The dining table in the dream of an unmarried girl heralds her engagement or imminent marriage and will be a sign that this man enjoys... With the qualities of chivalry and generosity. As for seeing sitting at the table with friends and eating with them with pleasure and love, it is a sign of trade, profitable work, or travel. And if one sees in a dream that he is trying to eat with his friends and his hand does not reach the food, this portends a short failure, but Temporary or gaining his rival's love. Seeing empty chairs around the dining table indicates betrayal of friends and relatives or portends failure and defeat, but victory and success will follow. In general, seeing the dining room in the house and inside the house is better than seeing it outside the house, which means stability and psychological peace. Either Seeing a dining room outside the home means travel and expatriation, even if this table is luxurious. If you prepare a dining table in a dream, this portends happy meetings and good circumstances. An empty table in a dream portends poverty or disagreements. As for cleaning the table, it foretells that joys will turn into disagreements. And problems. If you eat at a table without a cover, this foretells that you will have an independent personality and will not care about the success or behavior of others. If you see a table walking or moving in a strange way, this foretells that problems will enter your life and you will seek change to get rid of them. To see a dirty tablecloth portends disobedience. Children, servants, problems and quarrels after a period of joy and pleasure. Seeing a broken table portends bad luck. If you see someone standing or sitting at a table, this foretells that you will ride the wave of foolishness to have fun. If you hear the sound of hitting a table or writing on a table, this foretells A change in your feelings towards your friends would threaten your future. You would feel lost because of your relatives and friends’ disdain for the table: Some of them narrated as if the phone heard his voice and did not see his face reciting this verse: “Oh God, our Lord, send down to us a table from heaven.” He narrated his visions in one passage, saying: You are in a difficult situation, and you pray to God Almighty for relief and ease, and He will answer you. It was as he said. The translators differed in their interpretation of the table. Some of them said: The table is an honest and generous person who sits at it, accompanies him, and benefits from eating. If he has men at that table with him, he will be with the men gladly, and there is a dispute between him and them in the matter of life for him, and the abundance of clean loaves and good food on the table is evidence of this. Their affection is great, and some of them said: water

title: Interpretation of a dream about geckos for a single woman by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about fear of geckos for a single woman

preview.html: What is Ibn Sirin’s opinion on the interpretation of a dream of a single woman? Interpretation of a dream of a single woman in a dream: These are ominous and immediate warnings to the dreamer, and the colors of the stomach that appear in the dream, and its sizes, have different meanings, and since the vision has many meanings, they will be explained in detail in the following lines, and most of them mention important interpretations. By Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, follow the following: You have a dream that confuses you. Wait.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream: Weight in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates a cunning, unreliable person who wants harm and evil for her, and this person could be a relative or one of her colleagues at work. If she sees a gecko following her wherever she goes in the dream, In reality, she is closely monitored and all her steps are known as voyeurs and hypocrites. When she sees a group of geckos in her dream, they are gossipers, and she will fall prey to them, meaning that they will slander her, and unfortunately set a dirty trap for her that will tarnish her reputation and destroy her. Her life. If she sees an insect in her room, and every time she wants to get rid of it, she returns to the room, because this is an enemy that is not easy to escape from, and whenever she tries to get rid of it, it will come back again to harm her and disrupt her life. If she is thinking about engagement and a young man comes to her who wants to marry her and she sees If she sees him entering her house, the sign of the vision warns her against accepting marriage to this young man because he is immoral. A person who does not deserve responsibility. The face of a familiar person turned in her dream, like a gecko, and this is a strong warning to her that he is cunning and deceitful and will harm her and know her secrets and spread them to people. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said: Leprosy is a bad symbol in its connotation of magic and sorcery for the dreamer, and if you see Her house has a lot of lepers, so this indicates a lot of corrupt behavior in that house, so perhaps its people are the ones who abandoned prayer. Or performing magic on people. In all cases, the dream announces the large number of sins that push them to enter Hell and miserable fate. Perhaps the dream warns her of a skin disease that she will contract, and there is a good chance of contracting leprosy, and it is best to stay away from the sources of this disease to protect herself from its negative effects. If She was really confused with a girl and wanted to know the truth of her intentions towards her, and she saw that she was carrying dung in her hand, and she threw it in a dream until she became frightened, then this indicates the evil of that girl and her intense hatred for the dreamer, and he may soon accuse her of lying. When the dreamer kills the gecko without fear even though she is afraid Indeed, this is a promising sign of her great ability to confront her opponents and defeat them, and if one of them cooperates with her in the dream so that she can kill the leper. This person is actually working with her to obtain her rights from the oppressors and restore stability in her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about a deer for a single woman? Interpretation of a single woman’s dream about fear of geckos. A dream about fear of reptiles, insects, and rodents in a woman’s dream in general may come from the subconscious because of her many fears about them. Thus, if the dreamer is very afraid of leprosy in reality, he sees it often in the dream, and so on

title: The symbol of the Qur’an in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Holy Qur’an in a dream for a single girl: Seeing the Qur’an in an unmarried girl’s dream in a dream symbolizes that her qualities are blessed with honesty, and God knows best. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is opening the Qur’an, this is evidence that God will achieve for her whatever He wants and desires for her, God willing. Buying the Qur’an in a dream for a girl could be good news for her that she will get married soon. Perhaps buying the Qur’an in a dream symbolizes work that she will only gain with God. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone reading the Qur’an in a dream Interpretation of following the symbol of the Qur’an in a dream for a married womanWhen a woman reads A married woman recites the Qur’an and enjoys a beautiful voice in a dream. Perhaps it is a sign of the end of her sadness and the disappearance of worry, God willing. If she dreams of reciting the Qur’an, this is an indication of the feeling of security that controls her and fills her life. Also, the vision of memorizing the Qur’an for a married woman indicates the stability of marital life and that her life Enjoy it for the blessings and goodness it contains. And God knows best. Reading the Qur’an in a soft voice in a married woman’s dream is a good sign of her pregnancy, God willing. The loud voice when a woman reads the Qur’an in a dream is nothing but news that comes to her and brings happiness and joy. And when a married woman reads the Qur’an in a sweet and beautiful voice, this indicates that she will meet someone. It is missing, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the Qur’an as a symbol in a dream about a man and its meaning. When a person sees a green clinic, it is a vision worthy of praise, and it spreads to him the good news of Hajj and visiting the Sacred House of God. Also, seeing the Qur’an in a dream is only a good sign that comes to mind, God willing. The Qur’an in a man’s dream symbolizes the prestigious social status he enjoys, God willing. If a man sees many copies of the Qur’an in his dream, this dream indicates that he is doing a lot of good and that he is receiving his blessings from God Almighty. The dream also symbolizes that this person He desires to get closer to God who knows best. But if he sees Al-Musafa in the library, it is clear that he is a person whom God has reconciled with his condition and money, and the fear of God knows best. Carrying the Qur’an symbolizes that the matters that occupy his mind and which he wants to do, he relies first on God for their solution and progress. Perhaps the interpretation of seeing a man holding the Qur’an in a dream is marriage to a girl who adheres to religion and has knowledge of God. Read also: Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream. The meaning of seeing the symbol of the Qur’an in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When a pregnant woman sees that someone has given her the Holy Qur’an in her home, this is evidence of The psychological peace and comfort that women enjoy. Donating the Qur’an in the previous vision is also a good sign that God has reconciled in her home and her family. When a pregnant woman carries the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates that her newborn will be born without any health problems that he may be exposed to. In If she sees her husband in a dream, the book of God Almighty is presented to her. God will bless her with the child she wants, whether she wants a boy or a girl, and God knows best. If the pregnant woman is in the last months of her pregnancy and dreams that she is buying the book of God. She announces

Serving coffee can indicate the fulfillment of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, as it may express your ability to achieve the impossible, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drinking coffee, it may express some fateful decisions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees grinding coffee, this may be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. Interpretation of a man’s dream He gives me a book in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a man giving me a book in a dream could be a sign of knowledge and advice, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees someone giving a book in a dream, this may indicate knowledge, and God is knowledge. In the event that the dreamer sees that he is giving someone a book in a dream, it may be This is evidence of love, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, where dedication is a book that expresses strong feelings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a man cursing religion in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a man cursing religion in a dream. The curse of religion may indicate that you are following the path of misguidance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may indicate walking on the path of error, and God knows the unseen. When you see insulting religion unintentionally, this may lead to neglecting religion, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is insulting religion, this may be a sign. On apostasy from religion, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that my girlfriend insults me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of my girlfriend insulting me in a dream could be a sign of respect and appreciation, and God knows best. While you see your girlfriend insulting you, it may indicate that it may lead to trouble, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see yourself You curse, it may mean that you are in trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband cursing me in the

title: Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we present to you a detailed interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream. It explains the hearts of believers and brings them closer to God Almighty, but it is a vision that makes us curious to know the repercussions of this dream. Praiseful dreams in general indicate goodness and blueness and the arrival of happiness and comfort to the dreamer, but there are many different interpretations of this dream, which differ between men and women.Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation Ibn Sirin for the Qur’an in a dreamImam Ibn Sirin mentioned that if the dreamer sees himself reciting the Qur’an in a dream, then this vision indicates good integrity and uprightness. If the dreamer sees that he is performing ablution and holding the Qur’an in his hands, then this vision shows the dreamer’s piety and seeking his help in all aspects of his life. If one sees A lot of Qur’an in a dream, then this vision is an abundance of good deeds for the dreamer. As for seeing a golden Qur’an in a dream, this vision is good news of good luck and abundance of livelihood. This vision indicates the acquisition of a lot of money. In the case of seeing a green Qur’an, this vision means an opportunity To visit the Sacred House of God. If the dreamer sees that he is buying the Qur’an in a dream, this vision expresses that he has received a lot of money. The vision of receiving the Qur’an as a gift indicates success and success at the level of study or work, and this vision also indicates the acquisition of money. The patient who sees The Qur’an in a dream is good news of recovery from this disease, and God knows best. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the dream of the Qur’an. Imam Ibn Shaheen interpreted this vision as an indication of the wisdom and insight that the dreamer distinguishes. Buying the Qur’an in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s integrity. In the case of losing the Qur’an in a dream, this The vision symbolizes disobedience to God. Interpretation of a dream about carrying the Qur’an in the hand: Whoever sees in a dream that he is holding the Qur’an in his hand, this vision indicates the dreamer’s good circumstances and his desire to stay away from sins and repent to God. Among the connotations of this dream is that it indicates his kindness and abundant sustenance for the dreamer and his children. And this vision For an unmarried girl, it indicates marriage soon, and God knows best. As for a married woman, it is a sign of obedience to God. As for a pregnant woman, this vision is evidence of the ease of childbirth and the safety of the newborn’s health. Interpretation of the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman This vision is for an unmarried girl that shows her good morals. In the event that he receives the Qur’an as a gift in a dream, this vision indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. Reading the Qur’an is good news. For a single woman to achieve what she wants on the ground. As for carrying the Qur’an in a dream, this vision indicates that happiness will reach her. Interpretation of a dream about the Qur’an for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for a married woman, if she sees that her husband gave her a copy of the Qur’an in a dream, this indicates recovery from Illness, if she has a close relative suffering from an illness in reality. Reading the Qur’an indicates that she will become pregnant soon, and it also indicates the return of the absent person from his travels and the arrival of happiness in her in general. The Qur’an in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for this vision for a pregnant woman, it indicates health and well-being.

title: Interpretation of seeing geese in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing geese varies depending on what the person saw in his dream and depending on the person himself, whether he is male or female, single or married. Such as the shape and color of the goose has different connotations in the interpretation of the vision, and in this article we will show you the interpretation of the vision of geese in detail. Interpretation of the vision of geese by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees geese flying over his head in a dream, this indicates the high status of the dreamer and that he will reach high positions. In his work. But if one sees a white person in a dream in large numbers, this means that the dreamer will hear happy news. As for someone who sees black geese in his dream, this may indicate sadness and anxiety, or that the dreamer is in a big problem that is difficult to solve. Interpretation of the vision Goose for a man: If an unmarried man sees a beautiful goose in his dream, this means that he will marry a beautiful woman with a slim body. Seeing geese in a man’s dream means that he will get a lot of lawful money, raise positions, and raise his status. Interpretation of seeing geese for a single woman. Seeing geese in a girl’s dream Unmarried forever. If an unmarried girl sees geese running very fast in a dream, this means that this girl has many desires and goals that she wants to achieve, and her desires will be fulfilled, God willing. But if an unmarried girl sees geese floating in the water, it may mean that That she will get married soon, especially if the geese are white. Interpretation of seeing a goose for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees geese floating in the water or flying in the sky and she is in the last months of her pregnancy, this means that her birth will be easy. Seeing geese in a dream for a pregnant woman means that she will give birth A male child, but if a woman only sees goose eggs and does not see the geese themselves, this means that she will give birth to a baby girl. Seeing small geese in large numbers in a dream means that this woman will give birth to a large number of children during her life. Interpretation of seeing geese for a married womanIf a married woman sees She herself eats bananas, this indicates that she will get a lot of money. But if a married woman sees white geese flying over her house, this indicates that her relationship with her husband will change for the better, and if there are disagreements between them, they will be resolved, God willing. If a married woman sees herself buying geese White, this indicates the world’s love for it. For those who have a vision and want to explain it, we welcome your comments at the end of the article via the Shamloul website.

title: Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq, the letter Alif. The letter Alif is the beginning of many different words that can be symbols of things in our dreams, which need clarification, and that is why in our article we discuss the interpretation of dreams by Imam Al-Sadiq, the letter Alif, and see. What are the symbols of things that begin with this letter there is a mystery, and, God willing, this mystery will be solved. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. Seeing a needle in a dream means a close marriage and a veil resulting from this marriage. If you see a damaged needle in In a dream, this indicates corruption in the soul and poverty in money. If a poor man sees her in a dream, this means abundance of sustenance, for one who will be rich. If a married man sees her in a dream, this means an increase in money. If the dreamer sees her and she needs something to satisfy his need, with permission God. If he sees her alone in a dream, this indicates his imminent marriage. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Satan in a dream. Seeing Satan (may God curse him) in a dream is evidence of sedition and heresy in religion, committing sins, and forbidding oneself. Interpretation of seeing an ear in a dream. Seeing a large ear in a dream is a sign of guidance from God and satisfaction with what He has divided. Interpretation of seeing land in a dream: Seeing agricultural land in a dream indicates fertility. If the land is destroyed in a dream, this indicates a general loss. The expansion of land in a dream is evidence of moving from a place and traveling. To a new place. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lion in a dream. The sign of seeing a lion in a dream is death and injustice to people. Seeing a female lion in a dream means the presence of a woman with bad intentions searching for her. Interpretation of seeing a nose in a dream. Seeing a nose is evidence of bragging about feeding money and children. Interpretation of seeing a mother in a dreamDreaming of a mother in a dream is evidence of close nourishment and relief from God. See also: Holding a friend’s hand in a dreamInterpretation of seeing pyramids in a dreamDream pyramids indicate ten foreigners. This can also indicate longevity.Interpretation of seeing a deer in a dreamDeer symbol In a dream, it indicates victory over enemies and getting rid of them. Interpretation of seeing eavesdropping in a dream has the meaning of giving false testimony and a big lie. It also suggests gossip and gossip. See also: Seeing pins in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a rabbit in a dream. Meaning that the fortuneteller is a coward, whether he is a man or a woman. If he sees The dreamer is slaughtering a rabbit, then this indicates the death of the marriage, meaning that divorce will happen soon. Interpretation of seeing geese in the palms of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a jug In a dream, seeing a jug in a dream means repentance to God from sin and disobedience. Interpretation of seeing verses of the Qur’an in a dream. Verses of martyrdom in the Qur’an indicate difficulties and fatigue in life. Verses of mercy in the Qur’an indicate tranquility, peace of soul, and surrender to what God has commanded. Interpretation of seeing Abraham, peace be upon him.

title: Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin and its meaning

preview.html: The interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for individuals is the subject of our article today, because chicken is one of the most famous foods spread in many forms in our Arab world and the world in general, and it has many benefits that the human body needs, but scholars differed in the interpretation of seeing eating chicken in a dream in general, and especially for non-people. Married people, according to the condition of the chicken in the dream, because cooked chicken differs in its interpretation from raw chicken, and we find that. Grilled chicken may have a different interpretation according to some scholars. Therefore, in our article today, we will shed light on Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a single woman and eating chicken in general according to the interpretations of Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen in detail, so follow us. Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes A dream about cooked chicken, or cooked chicken in general, for an unmarried or single girl, means great livelihood, an abundance of money, a good life, and happiness that she will live. Ibn Sirin believes that if an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating cooked chicken, this means that she will be happy or engaged soon. But if the chicken is raw or undercooked, this is an indication of the backbiting and gossiping that she does unfairly against people all the time, and it may be evidence that she is exposed to a serious health problem. He pointed out that the dream of an unmarried girl eating chicken legs indicates her marriage to a man. He has high morals and good taste. But if she eats a chicken leg in her dream while it is cooking, this is a sign of the abundance of goodness that will come her way. As for roasted chicken, if it appears in an unmarried woman’s dream, it is a sign of a job opportunity awaiting her, or a lot of goodness, And a lot of money and a great diet are on the way for the pioneer. And if the taste of chicken was delicious and sweet in the dream of an unmarried woman, then this was a sign of the abundance of good and joyful news that is on its way to her, which will make her heart very happy. Eating chicken in a dream for a single woman in Nabulsi, Al-Nabulsi believes Seeing cooked chicken in general in a dream is a sign of an abundance of good food and a lot of food in the life of the dreamer. In the dream of a girl who is not married yet, cooked chicken indicates a close marriage with a good man. If she eats cooked chicken in her dream, this indicates good news. Her heart rejoices on its way to Him, and it is an indication of a kind, honest person with good morals. But if she sees in her dream a chicken lying on her eggs, this is an indication that she will be cured of diseases, God willing, if she is suffering from an illness or a solution to a crisis that she has been suffering from for a long time. . It is approaching. But if she sees in her dream the slaughter of a chicken, then this is evidence of evil or difficulty and a great disaster that the priest will come on the way, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. But if she sees in her dream that there are a lot of chickens inside her house, then this is an indication of great wealth on her way. As for If she ate raw chicken meat in her dream, this is evidence of a bad and failed relationship that would enter her and hurt her very psychologically and emotionally. Slaughtering chicken in the dream of a single woman from Nablus.

title: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dreamIt is considered one of the important interpretations that must be paid attention to, as prayer is an essential pillar of the Islamic religion, and the servant cannot be upright without it. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin There are many people who seek to interpret this vision with great passion, as its interpretation varies from person to person. To another. Where Ibn Sirin believes that if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is performing the prayer, then this matter indicates that this person’s supplication is accepted by God Almighty, and God knows best. Likewise, if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is praying, then this vision indicates that this person obeys God. Almighty in its peculiarities, it also indicates a lot of remembrance of God Almighty. If one sees in his dream that he is praying, but in the wrong way, there is no need for concern. In addition, the vision indicates great joy in the coming period and a change in situation in the blink of an eye. Interpretation Seeing prayer in a dream on a chair. Whoever sees himself performing the obligatory prayer on a chair, this is evidence of perseverance and doing everything he has to do, even if this task is heavy, and in this case if the person is suffering from an illness or disease. But if the opposite is true and he is not harmed This indicates that the person believes in himself that his actions are acceptable, and vice versa, so he needs to review himself a little. But if the fortuneteller sees that he is praying next to him without an excuse, this is evidence of illness. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dreamInterpretation of seeing prayer in a dreamIn the mosqueIf the dreamer sees himself He prays in the mosque, as this is clear evidence of achieving goals in the coming period. Also, the vision may indicate that its owner does not pay attention to the temptations of life, but rather lives a decent life, and God has everything he dreams of, no matter how difficult the request is. Praying in the mosque is also clear evidence of Good worship, because it indicates good brotherhood, and not only that, but it is clear evidence of sincerity of intention. Interpretation of seeing praying in a dream on the farm. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is praying on the farm, this is clear evidence of paying off all debts, if the person suffers from Accumulation of debts. This vision clearly shows the end of the previous misery and that he will then enjoy a decent life. If the dreamer sees himself praying on the farm and the farm is distinguished by a light green color, this indicates the fulfillment of desires and the joy and happiness that the person will experience. Interpretation of seeing the kiss of prayer in a dreamIf the dreamer sees a kiss Praying in a dream, where a person prays in the same direction as the Kaaba, is evidence that this person adheres to the teachings of his religion and does not deviate from them in any way. It is also possible that the vision indicates the good character and biography of the dreamer. Praying in the direction of the Qiblah in general is clear evidence. On order and rejecting randomness. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is performing an obligatory prayer in her dream, this is evidence of her success in life and her good conduct in matters. If you see her invoking God Almighty in her prayer, this is evidence of the arrival of sustenance, goodness, and blessing upon her. Whoever sees a married woman

Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dreamInterpretation of seeing prayer in a dreamIn the mosqueIf the dreamer sees himself He prays in the mosque, as this is clear evidence of achieving goals in the coming period. Also, the vision may indicate that its owner does not pay attention to the temptations of life, but rather lives a decent life, and God has everything he dreams of, no matter how difficult the request is. Praying in the mosque is also clear evidence of Good worship, because it indicates good brotherhood, and not only that, but it is clear evidence of sincerity of intention. Interpretation of seeing praying in a dream on the farm. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is praying on the farm, this is clear evidence of paying off all debts, if the person suffers from Accumulation of debts. This vision clearly shows the end of the previous misery and that he will then enjoy a decent life. If the dreamer sees himself praying on the farm and the farm is distinguished by a light green color, this indicates the fulfillment of desires and the joy and happiness that the person will experience. Interpretation of seeing the kiss of prayer in a dreamIf the dreamer sees a kiss Praying in a dream, where a person prays in the same direction as the Kaaba, is evidence that this person adheres to the teachings of his religion and does not deviate from them in any way. It is also possible that the vision indicates the good character and biography of the dreamer. Praying in the direction of the Qiblah in general is clear evidence. On order and rejecting randomness. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is performing an obligatory prayer in her dream, this is evidence of her success in life and her good conduct in matters.
